text:
e="preserve">Anwar Aziz Chaudhry (1931 – 22 November 2020) was a Pakistani politician and swimmer. He competed in three events at the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was the Interior Minister of Punjab. From 1988 to 1990, he was a member of the National Assembly.
Chaudhry died on 22 November 2020, at the age of 89.
